aboutText: Lottieâ€™s Beauty Lounge is an established lash and brow lounge based in the heart of North Norfolk.

Lottie is a fully qualified and insured specialist, offering full brow and lash makeovers to suit your personal needs. During the appointment, Lottie will discuss your end goal and then tailor the treatment to suit your desires and needs.
